news_header: Investment in the EEA is expected to grow by nearly 4%, with Finnish industrial investment also showing moderate growth.
news_text: The EEA estimates a nearly 4% growth in investment, while the Confederation of Finnish Industries anticipates moderate growth in industrial investment this year. The investment inquiry suggests a total investment increase to approximately EUR 9.7 billion, with fixed investment in manufacturing accelerating by about 5% and R&D increasing by around 2%.
